description: Frets on Fire is clearly a Guitar Hero or Rockband sort of game, but… it actually works. And it works well. Grab your (wireless, preferably!) keyboard, hold it with the F-keys near your left hands, and “strum” away. :D My main areas for improvement would be the graphics (feel a bit dated) and the variety of music, but I guess you can download more songs? Not really sure how that works.
Not to much to say except that it is a fun, free game that is similiar to guitar hero. Made me smile
I used to play this when I was in high school so I was pretty psyched to see it in the App Center of EndlessOS so I could show my daughter.
